Name: Pray in VR Medieval Christian Churches
About the game: The epidemic prevented us from going to church to pray. But we still have a way to pray. In the VR church, hold the cross in your hands, listen to sacred music, and pray to God. A private space for your soul! Traveling around the world, those religious buildings with great historical and artistic value are the most choice for tourists. What's interesting is that European churches often tower in downtown and can be seen almost everywhere. The architectural details of European churches indicate the opposition between the heavens and the earth.
